blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
Sirius: I did that adult thing where you buy a giant cake and just eat it. I am eating an entire cake.
Sirius: Update - There is...
body:
Sirius: I did that adult thing where you buy a giant cake and just eat it. I am eating an entire cake.
Sirius: Update - There is more cake than I imagined.
Sirius: I now see why my mom didn’t let me do this.

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: I did that adult thing where you buy a giant cake and just eat it. I am eating an entire cake.

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: Update - There is more cake than I imagined.

dialogue.name: Sirius
dialogue.label: Sirius:
dialogue.phrase: I now see why my mom didn’t let me do this.

blog.name: drarry-imagines
blog.title: Harry x Draco Imagines
blog.description:
Header image by @scarlet47 [PERMISSION BY ARTIST GRANTED]

This blog is a Bottom!Draco blog Only. Feel free to send prompts and and suggestions. I would be posting NSFW, one-shots, prompts and more.

Side Pairings that’ll appear: Pansmione, Roneville, Wolfstar, Linny.

summary:
DRARRY PLAYLIST:
Song #3: Blue by Troye Sivan 
(Suggested by @flippyspoons)
I want you, I’ll color me blue~
Draco noticed...
body:
DRARRY PLAYLIST:

Song #3: Blue by Troye Sivan

(Suggested by @flippyspoons)

I want you, I’ll color me blue~

Draco noticed Harry’s drastic change in moods almost instantly, his boyfriend was less optimistic then he used to be. He seemed more and more distant and seemed to have lost that spark in his normally blazing green eyes.

Instantly Draco thought it was his fault.

So he tried to cheer Harry up.

He did things he wouldn’t normally do, like he’d take Harry to those huge muggle moving pictures he seemed loved so much, he even began to go have dinner with the Weasley’s and have civil conversations with the abnormally ginger family.

But nothing worked

Anything it takes to make you stay~

He tried to talk to Harry, he really did but then Harry would put on that fake smile and pretend that everything was alright completely ignoring his question.

He asked Granger and Weasley about it but they just said that they don’t see what he was talking about and that maybe Harry was just tired.

Draco knew that wasn’t the case.

He knew his boyfriend, he knew that Harry was more then just “tired”.

Only seeing myself when I’m looking up at you~

He knew he should listen to everybody else and let Harry handle whatever he was going through by himself and he wouldn’t want to come off as clingy but god dammit he loved Harry and you couldn’t possibly expect him to just watch this happen.

So one especially depressing evening he confronted Harry.

“IS IT ME!?!” He screamed out as Harry and him sat in silence in the living room, he had been building this up for days and exploded in whirlpool of emotions. He felt the tears begin to form in his eyes, “Have I done something? Why won’t you talk to me for fucksake?!?”

Harry’s beautifully dim green eyes grew into saucers at the accusations.

“What are you on about?” Harry asked with a false grin on, tears fell more as Draco witnessed that smile he was supposed to love but as of right now it made his stomach twist violently, “I’m fine.”

Standing up from his seat on the couch, he loomed over Harry who was still sitting down.

His tears had began to fall from his eyes and he bit his lip to stop himself from sobbing. Gently kneeling down in front of the man he loved, he placed a pale hand softly on one tanned cheek.

The shade difference of their skin clashing perfectly.

“Please Harry,” his voice broken as he proper began to beg his lover, “talk to me.”

“I don’t know what your talki-” “DON’T”

Draco cut him off instantly, he couldn’t dare let Harry finish that dismissive sentence. He needed to get to the bottom of this.

“Don’t,” he repeated but more calmly then the first time, “just don’t.”

Harry tried, Draco could see the struggle as he tried to put that false smile back on but he seemed to crumble a bit like he was forcing a broken mask back onto his face.

Harry knew Draco could tell.

Wrapping his long arms around the bigger boy, he pulled him down for a well deserved hug and just seemed to hold him there. No one made a move to separate.

Draco knew not to comment when his shoulder got significantly wetter nor did he react when Harry wrapped his arms around his waist far more tighter then he normally would, as if he was terrified to let him go.

“I’m here Harry,” he whispered different comforting phrases into the ear of the broken boy, “I just want you to talk to me.”

“I love you so much,” Harry sobbed out, “I’m so sorry Dray, I’m so sorry…”

“Sshh,” Draco hushed him up, even though he wanted Harry to talk to him.

He soon realized that talking wasn’t the best option right now. I mean, they had all night to talk about problems and comfort the other but right now, at this moment, what if they just hold the other and maybe never let go.

I want you, I’ll color me blue~

Anything it takes to make you stay~

Only seeing myself when I’m looking up at you~

(I really hope this doesn’t suck because I tried to make angst and I’m not the best at angst. Thank you still.)

blog.name: queerofthecastle
blog.title: Drama Queer
blog.description:
When all is said and done, I have lived on my own terms. I wear both callus and crown with pride.
they/them pronouns please!
This is just a personal blog for the hectic conglomeration of my thoughts and things I like. Come say hi, I'm friendly!

tags: seamus and dean could have easily been lgbt+ also
mention them one time in the future being happy with a family
summary: Imagine a world in which Harry Potter was the Girl who lived. I’m not talking an AU or any kind of fanfiction, here. I’m talking...
body:
Imagine a world in which Harry Potter was the Girl who lived.

I’m not talking an AU or any kind of fanfiction, here. I’m talking a world in which Harry Potter was originally written as a girl.

Nothing else had to change, nothing else needed to be swapped, but with a female protagonist Jo could have revolutionized literature.

First and foremost, there would be a book in the mainstream media with a female protagonist that marketed to everyone, not specifically girls. A major problem in writing today is that if the protagonist is a girl, then it is assumed that it is a book for girls and that boys would have no interest in it. A female protagonist means a book is suitable only for female readers. This is a tragedy because it teaches little girls that their stories are less important and less interesting, that girls cannot be the protagonists in a story where there are strong male characters. If Harry Potter were a girl, we would be one step closer to the destandardization of the male protagonist. (I refuse to believe that, even if it were originally marketed to girls, Harry Potter would be any less famous or widely read. People don’t read Harry Potter because the protagonist is a male. They read it because the world-building, characters, and story are f*cking fantastic.)

Secondly, Harry Potter is an average character. If Harry Potter were a girl, it would teach little girls that it’s okay to not always be the smartest or the bravest: being average is acceptable. Hermione is a fantastic character, but she is most noteworthy for her intelligence and studiousness. This adheres to a stereotype that teaches girls that they have to be noteworthy to matter. Men are allowed to be average in our society, but women must always be exceptional if they want recognition. If Harry Potter were a woman, we would be one step closer to social change in this area.

Thirdly, there would be actual lgbt+ content in the series. Not some bullsh*t that is Jo saying that Dumbledore is gay but not backing it up in the text; an explicitly gay character that is recognized as such right in the books. Remember that none of the text had to change except for the pronouns: Harry would still end up with Ginny as his major love interest, she would just be a lesbian. And none of the text has to change! It didn’t have to be a big deal! The word ‘lesbian’ didn’t need to be in the books, just like the fact that Harry and Ginny’s relationship is not characterized primarily by the fact that it is heterosexual. Jo could have just treated being lgbt+ as normal, yet acknowledged it in the books. And then we would have a book in the mainstream media with real lgbt+ content and a fantasy world in which being lgbt+ is normal and children could read about a world where they could be accepted as normal no matter what. Again, one step closer to the social change we need. I don’t think that the popularity would have been effected too much, there are already wackjobs who boycott Harry Potter due to witchcraft, and I imagine that there’s some overlap with the wackjobs that boycott lgbt+ content.

I’m going to stop my rant there, even though I could go on. This post is longer than the progress I have on my essay right now, and that’s due in three hours so I should get to it, lol.

TL;DR: Reading fem!Harry AUs makes me bitter because I feel like it should have been canon. All it would have taken is one pronoun flip. Nothing else. It was that easy. It’s sad that we don’t live in that world already.

blog.name: andimthedad
blog.title: And I’m the Dad
blog.description: Scripts and scraps from my real-life parenting sitcom.

summary: Nerd
title: Nerd
body:
Beth: [age 10] "For my next birthday, I want to watch Goodburger, Monty Python, and all the Harry Potter movies."
Mom: "It's official: you're a nerd."
Me: [fake sniffling] "I'm so proud of you."

dialogue.name: Beth
dialogue.label: Beth:

summary:
“‘I’m not going to be murdered,’ Harry said out loud. 
‘That’s the spirit, dear,’ said his mirror sleepily.” 
Harry Potter and...
text:
“‘I’m not going to be murdered,’ Harry said out loud.
‘That’s the spirit, dear,’ said his mirror sleepily.”
Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban, J.K. Rowling

summary:
Ravenclaw 💙

 Got my wax seal supplies yesterday and started to practice on multiple stationery items :D Quite fun but sometimes...
caption:
Ravenclaw 💙

Got my wax seal supplies yesterday and started to practice on multiple stationery items :D Quite fun but sometimes slightly dangerous(?) LOL.

The word “Ravenclaw” is now written on a blackboard above my desk (pictured). Did a little painting on watercolour paper. :)

*Click on the images for better photo quality

IG: therobotstudies

summary: "The girl gave off an aura of distinct dottiness. Perhaps it was the fact that she had stuck her wand behind her left ear for...
caption: “The girl gave off an aura of distinct dottiness. Perhaps it was the fact that she had stuck her wand behind her left ear for safekeeping, or that she had chosen to wear a necklace of Butterbeer caps, or that she was reading a magazine upside down.”

reblog.comment: “The girl gave off an aura of distinct dottiness. Perhaps it was the fact that she had stuck her wand behind her left ear for safekeeping, or that she had chosen to wear a necklace of Butterbeer caps, or that she was reading a magazine upside down.”

blog.description: Mibba is a creative writing site designed for authors to share their stories, poems and articles and gain feedback from a growing audience.

summary: Forsaken Vengeance
title: Forsaken Vengeance
body:
Being the daughter of a Death Eater was never easy. Annalise Rowle learned at a young age how to protect herself with magic; not all good. When she becomes friends with the Gryffindor’s, Lise learns the truth of everyone in her life. Who is with her, and who is truly evil.

Chapter Two

Chapter TwoReagan paced back in forth in front of me, anger coming off her in waves. I sunk down a little further onto the couch as her grey eyes snapped down to me.“I thought Ronan and I made it…

Read more…

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.title: a sad gorl that writes
blog.description: welcome to the mind dump of a twenty year old recluse

summary: In the Dark - apathaestetical - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
title: In the Dark - apathaestetical - Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Chapters: 1/?
Fandom: Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
Rating: Mature
Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
Relationships: Draco Malfoy/Harry Potter
Characters: Draco Malfoy, Harry Potter, Narcissa Black Malfoy, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger, Teddy Lupin
Additional Tags: Angst with a Happy Ending, Post-Hogwarts, Mutual Pining, draco is a pining mess, Harry is an oblivious mess, Misunderstandings, We Love Hate Misunderstandings tbh
Summary:

What happens when hiding no longer becomes an option?

\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

HEY YALL! I have been in the fandom for as long as I can remember but this is the first time I’m coming out and actually interacting. SHAMELESS PLUGGING. I am an anxious mess but i decided that I want to contribute to this wonderful fandom so screw hiding. And here we are. It’s not yet done but it is in my head. ENJOY <3

blog.name: bitingdownpromo
blog.title: Biting Down
blog.description: The year is 2027. The wizarding community is tearing itself apart as danger lurks around every corner; the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power. Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance?

summary:
the electronics of your heart...
 The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the...
caption:
the electronics of your heart…

The year is 2027. Nearly three decades have passed since the battle at Hogwarts and the wizarding world continues its uphill climb towards a slow, tumultuous recovery. Danger lurks around every corner as the possibility of a wizarding epidemic sends the wizarding community into a frenzy that brings a new evil to power.

see how fast they fall apart…

Will you fight for what you believe, or take the path of least resistance? Whether you flee or bite down and take the heat, the next great war is coming and the outcome is up to you. Welcome to Biting Down.

home | plot | rules | wanted connections | character suggestions | application

blog.name: acelucky
blog.title: The road goes ever on and on...
blog.description: Emma. England - don't talk to me about Brexit. Feminist. Space. Goth stuff. Plants. Hufflepuff. Left my heart at Hobbitcon/Magic con. Multi-fandom trash can. Currently posting a lot of Red Dead Redemption 2, Tolkien (always), Marvel. Jeff Goldblum is the daddy. Benicihoe.

summary: Sometimes I feel like I’ve failed at life but then I remember the names of my tables at my wedding and reassure myself that I...
caption:
Sometimes I feel like I’ve failed at life but then I remember the names of my tables at my wedding and reassure myself that I have made good choices. The tables were;

* Halloween Town * Middle Earth * Jedi Temple * Hogwarts * Westeros 

And of course, the head table - Asgard
